featured.text: Other times, a magician may make you a magic charm, or say a spell, to cure you.
They may fill out an agreement spelling out who shoulders which responsibilities if a problem arises.

definition.zh_def: 拼寫，指用字母組成單詞的過程或行為。
definition.en_def: To write or name the letters that form a word in the correct sequence.
definition.example: Can you spell your name for me?
